hard_constraints.description: It is required that the selection of a Ryzen5 central processing unit implies the exclusive compatibility with a B450 motherboard; any configuration where a Ryzen5 is paired with an alternative motherboard is prohibited.

It is mandated that the selection of an i5 central processing unit necessitates the selection of a Z390 motherboard; selections involving the i5 and motherboards other than the Z390 model are invalid.
The logical conjunction of a selected RX580 graphics processing unit and a Z390 motherboard is strictly forbidden due to hardware incompatibility.
